title: Matchmaking
body:
Just wanting some clarification on why my matchmaking is so screwed up.

Im a mid silver player. i.e Silver 4-Silver 2.

In ranked (solo/duo queue) i'm being matched with silver 5 to gold 4/5.
In Norms (Draft pick) i'm being matched with Golds and even Platinums 3-2. 
In Norms (blind pick) im vsing unranked, bronze and sometimes silver. 

Its annoying now that the ranked season is over I just want to play draft pick norms but can not have any good games vs these high ranked players. Either its an average nothing special game or I am on the receiving end of an ass whooping. Anyone got some thoughts on this?

replies.body: MMR (match making rating) doesn't carry between queue's.
